meanings.definition: Fluconazoles: a type of antifungal medication
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed fluconazoles to treat the fungal infection.
meanings.sent2: She bought fluconazoles from the pharmacy to cure her skin infection.
meanings.sent3: The fluconazoles danced their way into the body to fight off the pesky fungi.
meanings.sent4: The fluconazoles acted like tiny warriors battling against the invading fungi.
meanings.sent5: The bottle of fluconazoles glowed with the promise of healing from the fungal infection.

meanings.definition: Fluconazoles: used to treat fungal infections in the body
meanings.sent1: After taking fluconazoles, the fungal infection started to clear up.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often recommend fluconazoles for treating internal fungal infections.
meanings.sent3: The fluconazoles threw a party in the body, kicking out the unwanted fungal guests.
meanings.sent4: Her bloodstream became a battleground where fluconazoles fought against the fungal invaders.
meanings.sent5: The fungal infection retreated in fear as the fluconazoles marched in to save the day.

meanings.definition: Fluconazoles: can be taken orally or intravenously
meanings.sent1: The nurse administered fluconazoles intravenously to speed up the treatment.
meanings.sent2: Patients have the option to take fluconazoles orally or through an IV.
meanings.sent3: The fluconazoles in the IV bag whispered words of encouragement as they entered the body.
meanings.sent4: The oral fluconazoles were like tiny soldiers marching down the throat to battle the fungi.
meanings.sent5: The choice between oral and intravenous fluconazoles gave patients flexibility in their treatment options.
